extendedInfo.description: The EventPilot conference app gives you instant offline access to your meeting or event program. Depending on the event, app features include:â¢ Personal Schedule: Build your personal daily schedule with an intuitive color coded schedule view.â¢ Now: Stay informed about hot issues, program changes, your upcoming sessions, Twitter feeds and organizer messages. â¢ Contact Sharing: Easily share contact card information via QR or Bump technology.â¢ Program: Browse the entire event program to create your personal schedule, take notes, rate sessions or speakers and more. â¢ PowerPoint slide viewer: Download presentations and take notes on slides while sitting in a session.â¢ Email Notes: Instantly create a trip report with all starred items, notes, and contacts you have made during the event.â¢ Twitter with tweet out functionality, expo and sponsors lists, animated conference venue maps, speaker list with photos, local information, and more.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Just for testing it works flawlessly.
reviews.author: Matthew Rauch

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what others are talking about.  This app downloaded in less than one minute.  It was fantastic and a life saving!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Android won\'t load Arvo guide....
reviews.comment: Its been stuck on 85% for ever and then it stopped and exited.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really buggy
reviews.comment: Force closes, gets stuck downloading, deleted my schedule once, kills battery... Would be really nice, but as it is it\'s just barely useable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Memmory hog, slow
reviews.comment: This ap is big and will not permit installation on sd card. For an ap that just needs to feed mostly text info, this is not great. Not impressed.
reviews.author: A Google User
